author: Timothy McLean
text: In calendar year 2013, one of the items I will be addressing with our Planning Commission deals with revisions/additions to our requirements for site plans for commercial and industrial development. Attached is a list of the current requirements. At this time, I am very interested in hearing any thoughts and/or ideas as to how to improve/revise this process to ensure that we have fulfilled our due diligence, relative to site plan approval.
title: Site Plan Requirements
